column4: is there a way to use add-apt-repository with a repo like this: deb http://repo.fooname.org/apt lucid/
according to -h, you can do something along the lines of add-apt-repository http://repo.fooname.org/apt lucid
not sure about the exact syntax though
I read the man and --help documentation but as it looks like it doesn't support repos other than on launchpad
